      • corsConfigurer

        @Bean
public org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer corsConfigurer()
        Enables CORS globally.
        Returns:
        A WebMvcConfigurer instance with default CORS configuration - allow everything.

      • pubSub

        @Bean
public com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSub pubSub(@Value(value="${bullet.pubsub.config}")
                                                   String config)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Creates a PubSub instance from a provided config.
        Parameters:
        config - The String path to the config file.
        Returns:
        An instance of the particular PubSub indicated in the config.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there were issues reading the config file as a BulletConfig.
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there were issues creating the PubSub instance.

      • publishers

        @Bean
public List<com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.Publisher> publishers(com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSub pubSub,
                                                                @Value(value="${bullet.pubsub.publishers}")
                                                                int publishers)
                                                         throws com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Creates the specified number of Publisher instances from the given PubSub.
        Parameters:
        pubSub - The PubSub providing the instances.
        publishers - The number of publishers to create using PubSub.getPublishers(int).
        Returns:
        A List of Publisher provided by the PubSub instance.
        Throws:
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there were issues creating the instances.

      • subscribers

        @Bean
public List<com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.Subscriber> subscribers(com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSub pubSub,
                                                                  @Value(value="${bullet.pubsub.subscribers}")
                                                                  int subscribers)
                                                           throws com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Creates the specified number of Subscriber instances from the given PubSub.
        Parameters:
        pubSub - The PubSub providing the instances.
        subscribers - The number of subscribers to create using PubSub.getSubscribers(int).
        Returns:
        A List of Subscriber provided by the PubSub instance.
        Throws:
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there were issues creating the instances.
